function NPC_508003:Init( NPCID )
--[[ User Data 1: BreakPart 횃불 --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 1 );
NPC_508003.BreakPartHP = NPC_508003.MaxHP NPC_508003.BreakPartID = 1 end
-- 판정 function NPC_508003:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo)
--GLog("NPC_508003:OnHitCapsule_1_0\n")
local AccDamage -- 누적데미지 local ThisNPC = AsNPC( HitInfo.Victim )
if not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( NPC_508003.BreakPartID ) then
AccDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(1) + HitInfo.Damage
if AccDamage >= NPC_508003.BreakPartHP then ThisNPC:BreakPart(NPC_508003.BreakPartID, HitInfo.Attacker) end
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, AccDamage ) end
return HitInfo end
